brief_description: This project aims to establish a comprehensive reference database of protein expression patterns across peripheral blood immune cell subsets
brief_title: Development of a Comprehensive Antibody Staining Database using a Standardized Analytics Pipeline
description: The goal of this study was to apply a standardized CyTOF workflow and analysis pipeline in conjunction with the Biolegend Legendscreen kit to comprehensively screen surface protein expression patterns across all major defined immune cell subsets in peripheral blood and to evaluate the impact of fixation on these expression patterns
hypothesis: We hypothesize that our screening and analysis approach will allow us to rigorously define reproducible patterns of surface protein expression across immune cells and to quantify their sensitivity to fixation
objectives: To establish a comprehsnive reference dataset of surface protein expression patterns across all major defined immune cell subsets in peripheral blood and to evaluate the impact of fixation on these expression patterns
official_title: Development of a Comprehensive Antibody Staining Database using a Standardized Analytics Pipeline
sponsoring_organization: Icahn School of Medicine at Mt. Sinai

personnel.organization: Icahn School of Medicine at Mt. Sinai
